name: Shivering +
matches: You feel the strength ebb from your body as the cold takes its toll.
Though still shivering, you are no longer frozen solid.
The bubonis entity sinks its teeth into you, and you begin shivering.
Your caloric salve dissolves as it ameliorates the extreme cold.
You have a particularly intense shiver.
^\w+ points (?:his|her) fists at you and blasts you with frigidly cold air\.$
Savage and brutal, a storm of ice-infused droplets rain down upon you, assailing your body with its ferocious onslaught.
^A snaking stream of ice from [A-Z][a-z]+'s maw forks into the room, blasting into you mercilessly\.$
